alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 2:13PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Jefferson, Taylor and southwestern Madison Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 213 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles south of Monticello to 11 miles south of Perry. Movement was south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Perry, Pinland, Hells Half Acre, Jug Island, Lamont, Eridu, Cabbage Grove, Scanlon, Dekle Beach, Jack Lee Island, Foley, Perry-Foley Airport, Hampton Springs, Cedar Island, Fish Creek, Goose Pasture, Iddo, Secotan, Boyd and Adams Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Madison
